contest-event.event-date:
May 6, 2006 D Hahndorf Band Festival
Hahndorf Band Festival 0 Entertainments Contest
hahndorf-band-festival
None
Hahndorf, South Australia, Australia Points were awarded for the Street March (Max 50 points). Music (Max 80 points), Entertainment (Max 20 points). A handicap points system was applied to the contest to reflect the various grades of the bands: A Grade Scratch, B Grade 10 Points start, C Grade 20 Points start
Best Band Award: Kensington & Norwood The Best Band in Street March: Kensington & Norwood The Best Drum Major award: Al Kidney, Hahndorf Town Band
Dec. 3, 2010, 5:48 a.m. April 2, 2017, 2:29 p.m.
1 Kensington & Norwood Brass Bruce Raymond
2 Unley Concert Band Kevin Cameron
3 Hahndorf Town Band Alwin Kidney
4 Salisbury City Band [Australia] Geoff Meikle
5 Enfield Brass [Australia] Alison Smith
